phrase.text: How far is the train station?
Excuse me, could you tell me how to get to the post office?
When does the next tour start?
Is the museum open on Saturdays?
Can you take a photo of me?
The next bus stop is at the end of the street.
We are going to meet at 6 o'clock in the town square.
Let's go to the city centre.
The zoo is next to the police station.
Can we get there by foot?
What would you recommend to see in the first place?
How much is the admission fee?
Do you have any free maps of the city?
Would you like to visit National Gallery?
Our final destination today will be a local distillery.
You must visit the old castle.
Take the second exit at the roundabout. Continue straight ahead for about a mile. The museum will be on your right.

London is the capital of England. It is a diverse and exciting city with many attractions. The most visited tourist attractions are London Eye, the National Gallery and Tower of London. Also Buckingham Palace, situated is in the city center, is a popular sight as it is the official residence of the British Queen. Every day in front of the palace Changing the Guard ceremony takes place. This is worth seeing while you are visiting London and it is usually witnessed by large crowds.

Welcome to Rome! Why don't you join us for a “hop on, hop off” sightseeing tour of the city... The buses leave every 15 minutes from the train station and stop at 10 different city attractions. You can get off the bus at any stop and enjoy your time in the local area for as long as you want. For more information come and ask tourist information office just next to the main train station entrance.
Last year we went for a weekend break to Edinburgh. We spent most of the trip sightseeing. We have visited the castle and the old town.

The gallery is open Monday-Friday from 10 am until 5 pm. Entrance fee is 10$ for adults and 5$ for children under 12 years of age. Photographing is strictly prohibited in the whole building and all cameras must be left in the cloakroom.
I have one younger brother and two sisters.
My parents got divorced two years ago.
My sister-in-law just got pregnant and she is expecting a baby.
My family lives in New York.
We have been married for 10 years and we have two children.
George is Robert's and Susan's father.
Anne is the youngest child in our family.
Carol and Michael are Robert's grandparents.
The modern nuclear family consists of dad the breadwinner, mum the housewife and several children.
Are your parents separated or they still live together?
Our family is very big. I have two brothers and three sisters. We also have twenty-one cousins: fourteen from my father's side of the family and seven from my mother's side.

Julia and Holy are twins and they look exactly the same. They have been brought up together and since they were kids their mother tried to dress them identically. There are many pictures in the family album where the girls are indistinguishable.
My family is a rather small one, with only three people, my father, my mother and me. My mother is a doctor and my father is a lawyer.
My parents got divorced a year ago. After the divorce my mother married a Canadian engineer and moved to Toronto. My father stayed in Washington and I decided to live with him.
I play tennis twice a week.
Last night we went to a live basketball game.
My grandfather was university boxing champion.
The Philadelphia Marathon is a popular athletic event.
Some people consider martial arts to be dangerous.
Do you like watching football on TV?
People often take up swimming to improve their fitness.
Darts is a popular pub game.
Do you think this team will go to the finals?
Chess is a sport that requires skills and intelligence.
Basketball is a team sport that was invented in USA.
Many families take their children and go ice skating in the evenings.
Baseball is very popular in United States.
He did not pass the ball to the other player.
Today we are going to win.
This is the best football magazine.
Paula's father reads sports news everyday.
My father goes jogging every day. He is very fit.
I like to play sports. My favorite is badminton.
Ian Thorpe is a famous Australian swimmer. He has won three gold medals in Sydney Summer Olympic Games.
I have been thinking about exchanging our tennis tickets. Instead of going on Friday, we should go on Saturday. What do you think?
In football game there are two teams playing. Each team consist of ten field players and a goalie.
Polish and Chech are Slavic languages.
I can speak Spanish, German and a bit of Italian.
Haggis is a Scottish national dish.
There are three colors on German flag: red, black and yellow.
What is a traditional Indian dish?
I was born in a small village in Salvador.
Italian dialect from south is very different from any other dialects spoken in the country.
Los Angeles has a large amount of ethnic and cultural diversity.
Eating turkey on Christmas Day in Australia is a tradition.
Russia is the largest country in the world.
Switzerland has four official languages. They speak Italian, French, German and Romansh.
I have double nationality. I am a French citizen and I also have a British passport.
Egypt is a country in north Africa. Its capital is Cairo and it has a population of over 90 million people.
I come from Spain and I was born in Barcelona. When I was four years old my family emigrated to USA and we stayed there until now. I can speak both Spanish and English.
It look like it is going to be windy tomorrow.
Let’s hope the weather holds out.
Yesterday it was hot and humid.
A lot of the crops dried up because of the drought.
I can feel the warm sunshine on my arms.
You get better weather on the east coast.
Last night we saw a beautiful sunset.
A desert is a landscape form or region that receives very little precipitation.
The bad weather spoiled our plans for the weekend.
In savanna climate we can distinguish two main seasons: wet and dry.
The alpine area has in general a much harsher climate than the rest of the country.
We had a drought in our area last summer. It did not rain for two months.
It is usually cold in winter. The temperatures are often below zero.
Tropical rainforests are found close to the equator. These areas are characterized by high humidity and heavy rains.
It is pretty warm. What is the temperature?
Summers are warm with occasional showers and cool nights. Winter temperatures range between 2°C and 5°C.
My birthday is on the 22nd of November.
I work through all week except Saturdays and Sundays.
1st of October is Chinese National Day.
A millennium is a period of one thousand years.
My training period is from April 15 to May 11.
Most people in France go on holiday in July.
I am going to a party next Friday.
We land at 5.30 pm local time.
Easter is a movable feast. Last year Easter Sunday was in first week of April.
4th of July is an important date in American history. On this day in 1776 America declared independence from Great Britain. After this it became a national holiday.
Christopher Columbus was born on 31 October 1451. He become famous for discovering America. He died in 1506 at the age of 54.
The meeting is going to be at 1 pm. It is going to last for 1 hour and 30 minutes.
We are going to depart at 6 o'clock. Please arrive at least 15 minutes earlier.
This red dress suits you well.
It is just a bit too tight.
What are you going to wear tonight?
Why don't you try it on?
You cannot wear trainers with a suit.
I like it but I think I need a slightly smaller size.
Where do you have changing rooms?
I need to buy a new winter jacket.
Did you wash my white summer dress?
You need to wear long sleeve shirt.
He is wearing a red T-shirt and black trousers today.
He bought her a gold ring.
This mini skirt is a bit too short.
Take a hat and sunglasses. It is very sunny.
She prefers casual clothes. She usually wears blue jeans and a sweater to class.
Did you see Jim's new coat? It is very fashionable.
She is so stylish! She must read all the fashion magazines.
I hate wearing high- heel shoes. They are always so uncomfortable.
We are going to the cinema tomorrow.
Have you seen the latest Harry Potter movie?
Argo is a 2012 historical drama thriller film directed by Ben Affleck.
This movie is based on the novel.
Steven Spielberg is a famous director.
I read three or four books every month.
Shakira is a Colombian pop singer.
We have seen a magician show last week.
Nowadays most towns have multiplex cinemas.
In theaters you can see plays, musicals or pantomimes.
Many people go to their local pub where they can play darts or pool.
Jennifer Aniston is a Hollywood actress.
At the weekend, younger people often go to a local disco.
There will be a concert of folk music at the town square.
Do you like going to the theater?
This play got very good reviews.
What row do you like to sit in?
I will try to find good seats for tonight show.
The circus brings the best magicians and clowns.
They specialize in making fun of the audience.
I'm exhausted. I'm going to stay at home and watch a movie.
This book is about a police investigator. I really recommend it if you like crime stories.
Each year Rio de Janeiro hosts the biggest carnival in the world. The tradition dates back to 1823.
This movie has won three Oscars last year. It is an absolute must see.
I have a appointment with a nurse tomorrow.
I have got a pain in my back.
It is prescription for the chemist.
I am having difficulty with breathing.
You need to lose some weight.
Take three of these pills a day.
A nurse needs to take your blood sample.
Are you on any sort of medication?
I am going to prescribe you some strong antibiotics.
My temperature is a little bit high.
Does it hurt when I press here?
Do you have any doctors who speak English?
We are going to put a plaster on your knee.
There is a possibility you might be pregnant.
I do not fell very well. I think I need to see a doctor.
I have been feeling depressed and I have been having difficulty sleeping. Could you give me an appointment with a specialist within next few days?
Are there any side effects of this medicine? I also forgot to mention that I am allergic to penicillin.
There are several patients in the lobby waiting for medical exams. Hopefully the doctor will be able to see you in about an hour.
After asking a few questions, the doctor's diagnosis was that I had a bacterial infection. She wrote me out a prescription.
My grandmother suggested that I need to eat chicken soup. I will try this tomorrow and if it does not help I will see a specialist.
We do not sell alcohol after 10 pm.
You can go to express checkout if you have less than five items.
Do you have a loyalty card?
It needs to be used by 13th of August 2013.
Could I have a carrier bag, please?
When you done with the shopping, go to the cashier.
Would you like to pay with cash or credit card?
Here is your change and your receipt.
Can I have a bottle of whisky?
I would like 20 slices of ham, please.
Today, more and more companies offer food delivery.
You should ask one of the shop assistants.
Supermarkets are quite convenient. They offer a much larger variety of products than traditional grocery stores.
Cheeses are in two places. The pre-packaged cheese is in the cheese aisle just next to us. You can also get cheese from the counter at the back of the supermarket.
You have 14 days to return the item. We can replace it or exchange for something else. You can also have a full refund.
Good afternoon! There is an offer on the biscuits today. Come and try them for free.
I would like to book a table for two for Thursday night.
Can I get a glass of water, please?
The veal they serve here is the best in town.
Mixed noodles with sliced chilli pork is an all time favourite of mine.
Would you like to have some more?
I am on a strict low fat diet plan.
One prawn salad for me, please.
I quit non vegetarian food a couple of months ago.
Would you like to go out for dinner tonight?
I think you should definitely try the chicken clear soup.
I enjoyed the meal very much.
I like my meat to be cooked medium rare.
A reservation was made for four guests for lunch.
Is the food very expensive here?
I hope the food is hyegenic in here.
I would like to get a double cheeseburger with some french fries.
I would advice you to try the steamed shrimp wontons here. Its like nothing you have ever had. They look beautiful as well as taste delicious and have the thinnest wrappers I ever came across.
I’d like to have the chef’s salad, please. Balsamic Vinaigrette would be fine for the dressing. Also, I’d like some bottled water please.

Excuse me, we are ready to make the order. For the starter, we would like to have one coarse country duck terrine and one goat's cheese and asparagus terrine. One salmon fishcake and one slow cooked blade of beef for the main course and two hot chocolate souffles for the dessert.
We are done for tonight. The food was very satisfying, thank you. The molten chocolate lava cake tasted absolutely divine and was a great way to end the meal.

We are in a bit of a hurry. So, can you get us the bill please. Also, as we am running short on cash, I would like to make the payment using my Credit Card. I hope that is acceptable here. If not, then can you please give me the address of a nearby ATM counter.
I want to open an account.
Can you please help me with opening a savings account?
I would like to update my passbook.
I would like to open a joint account with my wife.
How many specimen signatures do you need?
How much do I have to deposit to open a current account?
I want to encash this cheque.
Are you a customer of this bank?
Would you like to deposit the cheque for clearance?
Will they give me the money today?
It will take about two days, since it is a local cheque.
I would like to meet the bank manager immediately.
Please sign on the back of the cheque.
I need thousand rupees notes only.
It is advisable that you open both a checking account as well as a savings account. To open these accounts, you will need to make a deposit of at least $50.
If you would like to order cheques, you can do that right away. All you need to do is fill out this application. Give it about five to seven business days, and you should receive them in the mail.
Hi, I need some help. I wrote a cheque of $100 which bounced. I am quite sure that there is sufficient money in my account. My account number is 30773933648. Can you please look into it?

I need to file a complaint. Yesterday while I was making an online payment using my VISA debit card, I lost my internet connection right at the end of the transaction. As a result, my transaction failed but strangely enough, the exact amount of money got debited from my account.

Hello. I’d like, some information on the telephone banking services offered by you. Can you tell me how the telephone banking services work? My account number is 855678900089548 at the MG Road Branch.
Do not go near the fence, please.
Look, there is a cute white tiger cub.
During winter, you will find lots of migratory birds by this lake.
Do you know where the reptile park is?
You will find the information kiosk right beside the entrance gate.
Do not forget to get the zoo map at the information kiosk.
Please do not feed or tease any wild animals of the zoo.
Polythene bags, plastic bottles and food items are not allowed inside the zoo premises.
Do not try to enter any animal enclosure.
You are not allowed to carry any firearms or sharp objects inside the zoo.
Spoonbill, an endangered species is regularly being bred here.
The word 'zoo' is short for 'zoological park' or 'zoological garden'.
You shall be fined if you are caught littering the zoo premises.
Lions are known to sleep for 18-20 hours a day.
The zoo remains open for visitors from nine in the morning to five in the evening.
Bisons are the heaviest land animals in North America.
Wheelchairs are available at the entrance at no charge on a first-come, first-served basis.
The Zoo is equipped with disabled-friendly restrooms.
The Beluga, or white whale, is one of the smallest species of whales.

Despite looking like a cross between a pig, an elephant and a panda, these tapirs are closely related to rhinos and horses. The tapir’s trunk is a powerful sense organ that is integral to its search for food. It serves a dual purpose as hands to guide food into the mouth and to probe unfamiliar objects.

This is the world's best rainforest zoo having more than 2,800 animals representing over 300 species of mammals, birds and reptiles. Here the animals roam freely in open and naturalistic habitats and are on well-balanced diets ensuring their best health and optimum weight.

The Zoo remains closed to the visitors on every Thursday except if it is a national holiday. In that case, it remains open to the visitors on that day and the weekly closure is observed on the next available working day.

These American alligators once faced extinction. The United States Fish and Wildlife Service placed them on the endangered species list in 1967. Thanks to the legal protection, they were taken off the list just 20 years later.
About 90% of the park are paved pathways which are accessible by wheelchair. There are also ramps and allocated viewing areas for disabled guests to view various exhibits and shows at the zoo.
I really appreciate the opportunity to interview for this position.
Hi, my name is Michelle Scott.
I am very familiar with what your company does.
I am seeking to become an expert in my field.
I am energetic and have a positive attitude.
I have a great deal of experience.
I need to stay in the area because of family.
I want to grow in my job and move ahead.
I like to work alone on some things and then bring those things to the group.
I pride myself on my customer service skills and my ability to resolve what could be difficult situations.
I have exceeded my sales goals every quarter and I've earned a bonus each year since I started with my current employer.
I've learned to make my perfectionism work to my advantage at work.
Being organized wasn't my strongest point, but I implemented a time management system that really helped my organization skills.
I was the university topper in 2006.
I'm the kind of person who stays calm under pressure, and handles stress fairly easily.

My time management skills are excellent and I'm organized, efficient, and take pride in excelling at my work. When I'm working on a project, I don't want just to meet deadlines. Rather, I prefer to complete the project well ahead of schedule.

I like to make sure that my work is perfect, so I tend to perhaps spend a little too much time checking it. However, I've come to a good balance by setting up a system to ensure everything is done correctly the first time.

Sometimes, I spend more time than necessary on a task, or take on tasks personally that could easily be delegated to someone else. Although I've never missed a deadline, it is still an effort for me to know when to move on to the next task, and to be confident when assigning others work.

I evaluate success in different ways. At work, it is meeting the goals set by my supervisors and my fellow workers. It is my understanding, from talking to other employees, that the GGR company is recognized for not only rewarding success, but giving employees opportunity to grow as well. After work, I enjoy playing softball, so success on the field is catching the winning pop-up.

Stress is very important to me. With stress, I do the best possible job. The appropriate way to deal with stress is to make sure I have the correct balance between good stress and bad stress. I need good stress to stay motivated and productive.
Can I use your mobile phone, please?
There was a gun shot in the alley.
My brother has been missing for two days now.
I want to lodge a complaint against the teacher for child abuse.
What is the local emergency number?
All the sea shores have been evacuated.
There has been a theft in my apartment.
All flights have been cancelled due to the heavy rains.
You are asked to move to the emergency shelter as soon as possible.
There has been a train accident.
A lady and her two kids are trapped on the ninth floor.
Please hurry up and call the ambulance. My son was hit by a car. He is unconcious and is bleeding profusely.

Never use water on electrical fires, equipment or wires. Unplug equipment or cut power at the control panel if possible. If the fire is small, use baking soda or a multipurpose or dry chemical fire extinguisher. Call the emergency services as soon as possible.

If your clothing catches fire, do not run. Stop where you are, drop to the ground, cover your face with your hands, and roll over and over to smother the flames. If someone else's clothes catch fire, push them to the ground and roll them over and over, or smother the flames with a blanket or carpet.

Incessant and intense rains have hit the hills for over three days triggering flash floods and landslides. This has led to hundreds of deaths and hundreds more going missing. With many bodies still buried under 5-10 feet high mounds of debris in the valley area, the threat of an epidemic due to decaying corpses is looming large.

There were a series of bomb blasts and continuous firing at the town centre two hours ago. Fifty-four people have died including twenty-three women and nine childrean and around a hundred have been injured. The area has been evacuated and cordoned off. The police have started their investigation.
I need to take my dog for a walk now.
Are pets allowed inside the supermarket?
I take my cats to the vet every month.
Where can I get dog food?
My son recently got a pet iguana which he named Jamie.
My dog won the local pet talent show this week.
Does that gorgeous golden retriever belong to you?
Pugs are one of the most popular pet dogs.
Its my cat's first birthday today.
My dog is five years and eight months old.
My grandmother gifted me these two lovely parakeets on my birthday this year.
Our neighbour's hamster went missing last night.
Mrs Wilson had a tough time dealing with her dog's sudden death.
I always wanted to have pet rabbits.
My mother takes care of the kittens while I'm at work.
After a lot of pestering, my father got me a cat last summer. She is absolutely adorable and her furry coat is as white as snow. So, we named her Snowball.

When I was six years old, I had a little dog named Jimmy. He was a very faithful dog to our family. He used to take care of me and my sister when we were little. My mother always trusted Jimmy because he never used to leave us alone or allow anyone to touch us while she was away.

Pets have the ability to stimulate their caregivers, in particular the elderly, giving people someone to take care of, someone to exercise with, and someone to help them heal from a physically or psychologically troubled past. Having a pet may help people achieve health goals, such as lowered blood pressure, or mental goals, such as decreased stress.

Snakes are among the most fascinating animals to keep as pets, and with a wide variety of species to choose from, snake lovers may have a tough time keeping just one type. Though ferocious predators, most snakes can become docile and even friendly with enough handling and good care.

One of the health risks that is associated with pets is falling injuries. Tripping over pets, especially dogs, causes more than 86,000 falls serious enough to prompt a trip to the emergency room each year in the United States. Among elderly and disabled people, these falls have resulted in life-threatening injuries and broken bones.
Would you like to go to the prom with me?
Carol looks stunning in that purple gown.
We will be throwing our engagement party soon.
I'd like you to come to the beach party on Sunday.
I have been waiting for the graduation party for a very long time.
We are meeting after five years.
Phil's parents have arranged for a small post wedding reception party for the newly wed couple.
Susan invited me over to her place for a sleepover party.
Marie has been planning for her marriage party since ages.
I think I met you before.
Lily and George make a beautiful couple.
Julie's baby shower party is on Wednesday.
It is a pleasure having you here.
A LAN party is a party that involves multi-player computer games and uses a Local Area Network.
Susan hosted the party really well. All her guests looked very contended and happy.
Next month my parents will be completing their twenty-five years of marriage. I have been planning on throwing them a nice surprise party for a long time.
Richard and his family are throwing a housewarming party next Saturday. They have invited all the residents of the building. We will surely have fun.
We have organized a fundraising party tomorrow. I will be hosting it. There will be dinner followed by speeches by the board members.
